casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Allen MCKIVER 213PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 20, 2016 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for McKiver, Christopher Allen. Joseph E. Herrin, Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of October 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of October 2016."

Plaintiff-Appellant shall have up to and including the 23rd day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
